dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.clearAll
dt-option.summary: Set the message to be displayed in the SearchBuilder clear all button

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.clearAll` changes what will be displayed in the text of the SearchBuilder clear all button.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init language.searchBuilder.clearAll` parameter is `'Clear All'`.
dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchBuilder will set the clear all button to display a default text, in this case `'Clear All'`.
The value of `-init language.searchBuilder.clearAll` is passed into an `-api i18n()` function.

example.title: Change message for SearchBuilder clear all button
